MAKING A POSITIVE IMPACT ON COMMUNITIES
We continue nurturing our long-standing partnerships with non-governmental organizations and other social causes across all our six operational sites. In total, our community investments in 
FY2020 totaled USD$546,000.
to communities and healthcare 
workers > 25,000 masks

A BIG thank you to the front-line heroes! Kulicke & Soffa Santa Ana team delivered wrap meals to the medical staff of St. Joseph hospital in Orange County to thank them for their selfless dedication.

DOING WELL BY DOING GOOD
